title: Full Classification Example with ConvNet
description: Full run through of raw images to classification with Convolutional Neural NetworkIn this tutorial, we're going to be running through taking raw images that have been labeled for us already, and then feeding them through a convolutional neural network for classification. The images are either of dog(s) or cat(s). Once you have downloaded and extracted the data from https://www.kaggle.com/c/dogs-vs-cats-redux-kernels-edition/data, you're ready to begin.
